channel.title: Comments on: An Almost Very Embarrassing Moment
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: @Katikka Indeed this is me. I sent you an email to the address you gave when you registered to the blog. It's very surprising and exciting that you managed to find me :-)
item.content:encoded:
@Katikka
Indeed this is me. I sent you an email to the address you gave when you registered to the blog. It’s very surprising and exciting that you managed to find me :-)

item.title: By: Katikka
item.dc:creator: Katikka
item.description:
So the girl made a mistake, but now I wonder if i know you....
I once spend a summer in Israel, staying with a family i really really liked in Haifa. Etty, Charles, a cat Punch and there was Amit, who showed me some places before he went for a stay in the States, hm, I'm just wondering :-)
What do you say?
item.content:encoded:
So the girl made a mistake, but now I wonder if i know you….

I once spend a summer in Israel, staying with a family i really really liked in Haifa. Etty, Charles, a cat Punch and there was Amit, who showed me some places before he went for a stay in the States, hm, I’m just wondering :-)

What do you say?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Well, I guess it was just one of those moments :) I just treated her as though I knew who she was. And now I have to revert from that? I'm not _that_ good with awkwardness.
item.content:encoded: Well, I guess it was just one of those moments :) I just treated her as though I knew who she was. And now I have to revert from that? I’m not _that_ good with awkwardness.

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: Oh god (as if)...Why didn't you clarified the misunderstanding as soon as it hit you?
item.content:encoded: Oh god (as if)…Why didn’t you clarified the misunderstanding as soon as it hit you?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: After the wedding we've been to, it turns out you look like a "white guy" frmo Jerusalem yourself :)
item.content:encoded: After the wedding we’ve been to, it turns out you look like a “white guy” frmo Jerusalem yourself :)

item.title: By: udim
item.dc:creator: udim
item.description: All white people look alike, eh?
